parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_TIMER_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_timer_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified TIMER interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if the interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the TIMER interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified TIMER events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for capturing the TIMER value.

simplesect.para: This function triggers the capture task for given channel and returns latched timer value.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Capture channel number.

simplesect.para: Captured value.
nrf_timer_task_trigger Function for activating the specified timer task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified timer task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.
nrf_timer_event_clear Function for clearing the specified timer event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_event_check Function for retrieving the state of the TIMER event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified timer event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.
nrf_timer_shorts_enable Function for enabling the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be enabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_shorts_disable Function for disabling the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_shorts_set Function for setting the specified shortcuts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Shortcuts to be set.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_int_enable Function for enabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_timer_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_int_disable Function for disabling the specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_timer_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_timer_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_timer_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given TIMER task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given TIMER task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given TIMER event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given TIMER event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_mode_set Function for setting the timer mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Timer mode.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_mode_get Function for retrieving the timer mode.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Timer mode.
nrf_timer_bit_width_set Function for setting the timer bit width.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Timer bit width.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_bit_width_get Function for retrieving the timer bit width.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Timer bit width.
nrf_timer_prescaler_set Function for setting the prescaler factor.
Prescaler value is expressed as $ 2^{prescaler\_factor} $.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Prescaler factor.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_prescaler_get Function for retrieving the prescaler factor.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Prescaler factor.
nrf_timer_cc_set Function for setting the capture/compare register for the specified channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified capture/compare channel.
Value to write to the capture/compare register.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_cc_get Function for retrieving the capture/compare value for a specified channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The specified capture/compare channel.

simplesect.para: Value from the specified capture/compare register.
nrf_timer_capture_task_get Function for getting the specified timer capture task.

parameterdescription.para: Capture channel.

simplesect.para: Capture task.
nrf_timer_compare_event_get Function for getting the specified timer compare event.

parameterdescription.para: Compare channel.

simplesect.para: Compare event.
nrf_timer_compare_int_get Function for getting the specified timer compare interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Compare channel.

simplesect.para: Compare interrupt.
nrf_timer_one_shot_enable Function for enabling one-shot operation for the specified capture/compare channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Capture/compare channel.

simplesect.para: nrf_timer_one_shot_disable Function for disabling one-shot operation for the specified capture/compare channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Capture/compare channel.

simplesect.para: NRF_TIMER_HAS_ONE_SHOT Symbol indicating whether timer supports one-shot operation.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the TIMER peripheral.
